item.description:
Ok, we can only have 35 people so answer yes or no only. Please bring food to share, your beverage of choice and serving plate/utensils for food.. you can email me soulpartattheaol place if you need ideas of what to bring

I am only listing the event on this group only..

see you all next week
Nancy
item.how_to_find_us: we will email you the address -- near Bluback square, west hartford

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Our Superbowl Party is Official, private home in west hartford
